Parameters.Title: Result field name
Parameters.Name: ResultFieldName
Parameters.Comment: Selector for json. If not set - value will be compare with all result

Parameters.Title: Compare type
Parameters.Name: CompareType
Parameters.Comment: Compare format: request result - operator - value from form

Parameters.Title: Result field value
Parameters.Name: ResultFieldValue
Parameters.Comment: For In/NotIn type compare set values with separator. Example: value1, value2, value3

Parameters.Title: Process id
Parameters.Name: ProcessId
Parameters.Comment: If not set will be use id for current process

Parameters.Title: Compare type
Parameters.Name: CompareType
Parameters.Comment: Compare format: parameter - operator - value from form

Parameters.Title: Value
Parameters.Name: Value
Parameters.Comment: For In/NotIn type compare set values with separator. Example: value1, value2, value3
